intro: Hedyotis patens, commonly known as the common arrowroot, is a herbaceous plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant features opposite, elliptic leaves with a smooth texture and small, white flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Hedyotis patens is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various health purposes.
